fact_check_explanation_title: Here is the transcript of what Boris Johnson said on This Morning about the new coronavirus
fact_check_explanation_summary: Claims the Prime Minister said the country should take the new coronavirus “on the chin” and allow it to spread through the population have been taken out of context.

fact_check_explanation_title: Experts say soap and water is preferable, but high alcohol sanitiser does work
fact_check_explanation_summary: Experts say soap and water is preferable, but high alcohol sanitiser does work.

fact_check_explanation_title: This is not a vaccine for the 2019 coronavirus
fact_check_explanation_summary: There are many different types of coronavirus, and they can affect humans or animals.

fact_check_explanation_title: There’s not enough evidence to say it’s as easy to buy drugs as pizza in the UK
fact_check_explanation_summary: The head of a Home Office investigation into drug use in Britain claimed it is almost easier to buy drugs than pizza.

fact_check_explanation_title: 726 homeless people are estimated to have died in England and Wales in 2018
fact_check_explanation_summary: The figure is not around 700,000 as shadow chancellor John McDonnell said on the Andrew Marr show.

fact_check_explanation_title: What can you do to avoid the new coronavirus?
fact_check_explanation_summary: The official guidance recommends washing your hands with soap and water often for at least 20 seconds, and always when you arrive at home or work, and eat or handle …

fact_check_explanation_title: It’s true these things kill more people each day than Covid-19 has so far
fact_check_explanation_summary: Cancer, diabetes, and snake bites all cause more deaths than Covid-19 has so far.

fact_check_explanation_title: A rash is now listed as a possible symptom of the new coronavirus
fact_check_explanation_summary: Symptoms include a persistent cough, and high temperature.

fact_check_explanation_title: Most of these NHS jobs are classed as “skilled” under new immigration rules
fact_check_explanation_summary: The minimum eligible salary will be £20,480, but other criteria will also apply.

fact_check_explanation_title: No, Celine Dion didn’t wind her car window up while a fan was singing to her
fact_check_explanation_summary: Celine Dion didn’t wind her car window up at a singing fan. This video is edited. Celine Dion waited patiently as the fan sang ‘I Surrender’

fact_check_explanation_title: Gambling spend down since 2008 on average
fact_check_explanation_summary: Licensed gambling has grown 40% over the last decade. However, this is largely because before 2014 non-UK online gambling firms weren’t counted.

fact_check_explanation_title: Children aren’t immune from the new coronavirus
fact_check_explanation_summary: Claims that children can’t get Covid-19 are incorrect.
